infotexts.jobdescription.bodybuilder:
Bodybuilders, although they do not have special skills that can be very useful in helping the team and / or setting up the submarine, they can still be useful.
After all, among the common features of submariners, bodybuilders have a strong advantage among ordinary workers:
* Ability to work in confined spaces: Not afraid of closed spaces and ready to perform their duties in submarine conditions. * Endurance: Has high endurance, which is important for long dives. * Physical strength: Able to move heavy loads and perform physically demanding tasks. * Psychological stability: Not afraid of the depths and calm in critical situations.
(Max in crew: 4)
infotexts.jobdescription.deliveryman:
A submariner's delivery man is a specialist responsible for the movement of cargo and materials inside the submarine. He is engaged in:
* Transportation: Delivery of equipment, provisions, tools and other necessary materials to different sections of the submarine.
* Storage: Tracking supplies, their safety, proper stowage and organization of warehouses.
* Equipment: Knowledge and ability to work with loading and unloading equipment and specific mechanisms.
* Safety: Compliance with safety regulations, prevention of damage and loss of cargo.
The delivery man is an indispensable member of the team, ensuring its vital functions and uninterrupted operation.
(Max in crew: 3)
infotexts.jobdescription.highvoltageworker:
The submariner is an electrical specialist responsible for: * Maintenance: Electrical equipment, control systems, lighting and communications of the submarine. * Repair: Troubleshooting electrical systems, replacing and connecting components. * Safety: Monitoring voltage, grounding and insulation, preventing short circuits and other hazardous situations. * Prevention: Carrying out preventive maintenance and electrical service.
The submariner is the guarantee of uninterrupted operation of vital submarine systems, ensuring safe and efficient operation.
(Max in crew: 2)
infotexts.jobdescription.terrorist:
A Terrorist in a submarine team is a specialist responsible for:
* Covert infiltration: Behind enemy lines using a submarine or other means.
* Subversive actions: Planting explosive devices, damaging infrastructure, sabotage.
* Information gathering: Reconnaissance, surveillance and transmission of data on enemy facilities.
* Special operations: Carrying out complex tasks that require special training and skills.
A Terrorist is a highly skilled and experienced fighter who can act alone or as part of a group, using his ingenuity, endurance and knowledge of enemy territory.
(Max in crew: 1)

infotexts.afflictiondescription.nomoredeals: Im tired of this all situation. (+11% turrets attack speed , +10% turrets power consumption , +50% turrets charge speed)
